review: Excellent speed and access to almost everything I want. I travel a lot and am often at hotels, and, for me, the most outstanding feature which sets the fire stick apart from items like Roku or Roku stick is the ability to use Hotel Wifi with the firestick. Doing so with the Roku is problematic (although possible). With firestick, it is automatic. It gets you onto the hotel website where you can put in the access code, and it works! At home, I prefer the Roku (3 or stick). Although Roku is slower, it has CBS All Access, Vudu, a much better search engine that checks netflix and other websites, and its remote, although bulkier is easier to use which is great when you are tired. The fire remote, however, is also very good, just not as easy.
